summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Omni-Crypto Hybrid Deep Learning Trading System. All 14 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend Dashboard, Training, and Predictions pages all working correctly with proper data display and interactions.

minor.issue: CryptoPanic API returns 404 - using MOCKED sentiment data

Console warning in Training page about chart dimensions when switching tabs (recharts library issue, non-blocking)
seed_data_creation: Test predictions and training sessions created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working: Dashboard with price charts, AI predictions, Training with Pure ML and Mathematical modes, Predictions history. CryptoPanic sentiment API is mocked. TensorFlow training works with real model training (not mocked).

Returns OHLCV data with technical indicators
Returns prediction with direction, probability, TP/SL

Network architecture config, Math strategies, Progress tracking, Training history all working
